There was a 38-year-old MILF wearing workout clothes who appeared to keep herself in very good shape. A chubby nerd girl with large E-cup boobs who appeared to be 17. A little boy about 6 and a little girl about 5 with their two 20 year old parents. There was a black grandfather and grandmother shopping with their 23-year-old busty granddaughter. And finally, there was an overweight hispanic woman in her early 30s reading a book. These were just the people from the food court.

New victims came into view when 3 jocks came out of a sport goods store, 2 50-year-old Asian women wearing dresses came out of a scented candles store, a teenage couple came out of a videogame store, and a pencil-thin nerd boy came out of a comic book store.

Ah, so many wonderful choices.

"Dad, you should eat something." Issac's attention was brought back to Charles Wilbur. "But, it will go straight to my hips dear."

"If it hasn't gone to your hips after 59-years, then I don't think it ever will." Daliah said, causing Issac to shake his head. He then focused on Daliah and her sons. He swapped them with....
15133323331112112113.title: Mr. Wilbur, his daughter, and Issac go shopping...

choices: Earl is back with some crazy get rich quick scheme
It's Shannon along with a waitress body wearing Earl
It's Leah wanting to pick up her dog
152.content:
Frank Carlson was doing what he usually did on his average Saturday after now a days. He sat back in his dirty old recliner petting his (or more accurately his daughter Leah's) black labrador Daisy. Frank had just put an empty bottle of beer on the ground to go along with other 100 or so that littered his small home. Frank was about to open another when he was stopped by a knock on the door and voice on the other side called out. "Frank, bro, you've got to let me in and see this stuff."

Frank sighed and reluctantly put down the beer and opened the door. He was annoyed that he actually had to stand up and do something today other than sit still living off of a combination of welfare and the money his and Frank's parents had left them, but when Earl was this motivated to see him it usually meant he got his hands on something good. Probably just some slightly stronger strain of weed, but who knows, maybe Earl actually got his hands on some good stuff today. Little did Frank know what he was about to get into when he opened the door.

Earl barged in with his hands inside of a ridiculous overcoat that wouldn't look out of place at a noir themed costume party. "Earl, what the hell are you wearing?"

"What? It's my jacket, I needed to look inconspicuous."

"Inconspicuous? It's the middle of summer in fucking Las Vegas. It's hot as balls and you're walking around in an overcoat. You could not look more suspicious."

"Well smartass if I was just wearing my usual shorts and t shirt there would be no way I could hide...this!" Earl whipped open his coat and Frank looked away thinking Earl was flashing him as a part of some sort of stupid drunken prank, but when he turned around he saw that Earl was pointing a purple and silver colored weird looking handgun at him. "WHAT THE FUCK!" Frank said as he dived behind his torn up recliner and bruised his legs on some garbage. "SHIT Earl! What's wrong with you! You want the rest of the inheritance! Well fuck you! We probably spent it all by now so you're not getting NOTHING!"

"Frank! Calm down! It's not a big deal, it's actually really cool!"

"Guns are not cool Earl! They are fucking dangerous! You don't point it at someone unless you want them dead!"

"I wasn't going to kill you! That's not what this does! Screw it, I'll just show you." Frank poked his head out from behind the recliner just long enough to see Earl point the gun at Daisy and pull the trigger. There was no bang, but there was a weird noise that sounded like quick bird chirp, a blue projectile hit Daisy, and down she went.

"You asshole! What's wrong with you!" Frank said as he went around the chair and charged at Earl ready to tackle him, but Earl was ready for him and pointed the gun at Frank. Frank heard the weird chirp, saw a blue light, and everything went black.

Blackness was all Frank saw, he thought his crappy waste of a life had come to an end. He thought about his ex wife Linda and how much they hated each other's guts and he thought about Leah and how much she hated him too even though he actually kind of tried to not be shitty to her. He thought about Earl and how much time the two of them had wasted together just drinking and smoking God knows how many days away. In the blackness Frank even thought he could hear Earl's voice say something he'd heard about 1000 times. "Hey dumbass, wake up."

Instinctively these words caused Frank to open his eyes, and was surprised to see he wasn't dead after taking a bullet to the brain. "What the hell." Frank said as he tried to stand up only to find his legs didn't support him. Earl laughed, "I think you might find it easier to walk on all fours good buddy."

"Seriously, what the hell are you talking about." Frank said as the room began to come into focus and he realized Earl was squatting down to look him in the eyes, and not only that, the proportions of the entire room seemed off. And finally remembered about Daisy, he turned to look for her and yelped when he saw her. Instead of seeing his daughter's dog on the floor bleeding to death like he expected, Daisy was sitting in his recliner and while her head was bullet hole free, the rest of her body was very wrong, in fact it was human, and bared a startling resemblance to his body. Connecting the dots Frank looked down and sure enough from the neck down he had the body of his daughter's black labrador.

"The FUCK!"

"I know, it's cool right!" Earl said looking at the weird gun that had done this with an awed look in his eyes. "I went out to the usual dispensary, but it must have closed or something because there was this cheap looking magic shot. And the old dude inside just told me that this gun would be just the spark I needed to get my ass in gear. I didn't believe him until he pointed it at me and himself and swapped us around. He shot again and swapped us back and I gave him all the cash I had for it. Frank, I don't know how yet, but this is going to make us rich."

"Earl, how is turning me into a dog going to make us rich."

"Oh I was just fucking with you. Plus I had to show you how it works. Now I'm going to go out to Shannon's diner for some lunch and when I get back we'll have a brainstorming session. You go ahead and get started. I'll see you in a few hours." Earl got up to leave when Frank called as he awkwardly tried to walk on his new paws to his brother and stumbled a bit on the way, "Wait! You can't leave me like this!"

Earl smiled and smacked himself in the head, "Silly me, you're right." And Earl went to the kitchen and set out a bowl of dog food and a bowl of water, "I can't expect Daisy to take care of you like this. I think this thing had reality altering stuff, but I haven't messed with it yet so I don't know how other people will react to you. All right, I'm out. If you shit in the house I'm not cleaning it up. Later." And with that Earl was gone. Frank tried to paw at the front door to open it to chase after him but couldn't manage it. Reluctantly he went back to the chair and climbed up and tried to get comfortable with Daisy. "This is just a bad dream. I'm going to wake up and it'll all be over." Frank said as he closed his eyes.

He didn't even get a chance to dream as about an hour later there was another knock on the door.
152.title: Earl and Frank and a Head Swapping gun

choices: Frank decides to try being a waitress too.
Frank goes job (and body) hunting with Shannon.
Frank wants to try to use the Head Swapping Gun to get close to his family.
1522.content:
Frank was hoping that he had been dreaming when he thought about Earl shooting him with some crazy gun that gave him his daughter's dog's body, but when there was a loud knocking on the door Frank tried to stand up and was brought back to his crazy reality. Frank tried to stand up out of his chair on his own two hind legs but his labrador legs quickly buckled and he fell about a foot to the floor. The knocking at the door continued. Not wanting anyone to see him like a freak, he ran back behind the couch and bent down hoping no body would see him or Daisy in his body asleep on the floor. Another set of knocks then Frank heard a voice on the other end. "Come on Frank, let me us in."

Frank breathed a sigh of relief that it was his brother finally coming to his senses and ready to turn him back. "I can't exactly open the door currently dumbs. Use the key taped under the mailbox."

Frank heard the tumblers unlock and went from being excited to see his brother to very disturbed. Instead of his brother having his normal tall and overweight body with his usually poorly dressed self, his brother's head now sat atop the body of a short hispanic girl wearing very cut off jeans and a small flannel shirt that was tied up to show off his now C cup boobs. Frank could only let out a guteral, "Whuuu." Upon seeing Earl with this body, it took him a fell few seconds to realize that Earl didn't come alone.

"Oh my God, you actually did swap your brother with a dog and left him here alone." Frank was surprised to hear the voice of Earl's longtime girlfriend Shannon. A beautiful blonde girl, Shannon worked at a diner called the Pinup Paradise where all the waitresses dressed up like old pinup models from the 40's-60's or so. Shannon was at the moment dressed in a short red and white patterned dress that looked like it was from another era. Shannon bent down and smiled as she actually stroked your back. Without knowing what you were doing you felt one of your back paws start shaking uncontrollably due to how good that felt. "Don't worry, I'll take care of you Frank." With that Shannon pulled the all too familiar silver and purple gun out of her purse and took a shot at the sleeping Daisy and Frank. A chirp and a blue flash inspired blackout later Frank came to surround by a small hill of beer bottles. Frank stood up and thanked Shannon, "Thanks a million, I was afraid I was going to have to get used to shitting on the floor." Then looking at his bombshell bodied brother he asked, "So...what's the story here."

"Yeah Shannon, I'm still not quite clear on your reasoning for this." Earl said bitterly referring to his new body.

"Well, this lazy bum that I call my boyfriend came to me in the middle of happy hour and told me he had this crazy device that would make us rich. I asked how and he didn't know exactly how but told me it swapped heads. He told me he swapped you with a dog. He started ranting random things about how this was going to make us rich without having to do any work but not giving any real plan. I was starting to get a little bit miffed and then I got set off when I caught Earl looking at my good friend Vickie's ass. I may have overreacted, and after accidentally messing with a knob or two I shot him and Vickie to test the device. And sure enough as you can see, it worked."

"And then some, damn my feet are killing me." Earl fell back on Frank's couch and kicked off the pair of heels that Frank just noticed Earl was wearing.

"I was just getting to that," Shannon continued, "It turns out that the knobs or buttons I hit actually not only swapped Vickie's body with Earl's, it also swapped their jobs. So now Vickie is back at her house with Earl's body and nothing to do while Earl..."

"Just worked his ass off shilling coffee and burgers to perverts who kept looking at my ass."

"At least it's a cute ass." Shannon said winking at Earl, but he was too annoyed to notice it.

Frank began to laugh, "So Earl, you left here intending to get rich quick and you ended up with a job. Not exactly what you wanted, but it's a productive day for you."

"See, that's exactly my thought process." Shannon said excitedly, "I'm sorry you don't have your body but you have a job and after over a year of not having a job this is probably going to be good for you."

"Good for me? I'll show you what's good for me, give me the Head Swapping Gun, I'll swap with a fucking CEO or something and make real money with a body of my choosing."

Shannon put the gun away into her purse, "No way, you have no experience with that sort of thing. And while for some reason I love you, I'm not letting you take the job of someone with power. You can live with being a waitress for a while. You can do that with no experience and at worst you screw up an order. If you screw something up as a CEO and let's face it you would, thousands of people could lose their jobs."

"But I'd have a golden parachute and never have to work again ouch!" Shannon had actually given Earl a quick punch to his skinny arm. "Earl, it's horrible that you'd say something like that, you need to learn to respect the working class. That's another reason I think being a waitress is going to be good for you. Maybe after a few months of waiting tables you'll respect blue collar workers and maybe we can look for a white color body and job to swap you into."

Earl stood up and Frank was amused at how his brother now only stood up to his chest, "A few months!? Are you fucking kidding me?"

"No, I'm not, I'm tired of being the only one in this relationship doing real work, now you will too. And speaking of jobs..." Shannon turned to Frank. "You might be even worse than Earl when it comes to getting work. I'm not in a relationship with you so I can't make you get a job, but I can bet if you wanted to work with us the the Pinup Paradise you could have a good experience. You can even try it for a little while and swap out if you don't like it."

"Why does he get a choice in the matter?"

"Because I'm not sleeping with him and if you keep bitching you won't either," Shannon snapped at Earl. She didn't get like this often but both Frank and Earl knew to not mess with her now. "Now Frank it's up to you, but I've got a day off tomorrow, I can go around town with you to find a job and body you might feel more comfortable with. What do you say?"

Frank knew that Shannon wasn't going to let him scheme his way to riches like Earl had hoped, but Frank didn't hate the idea of actual hard labor that much...for now. But then again looking at his daughter's dog a thought popped up. If he swapped 'careers' with Daisy, maybe, just maybe his daughter wouldn't hate him. He could get to know her better and maybe he could try to make her hate him less and actually build a relationship. Hell who knows, maybe if she viewed him as a pet he could actually get along with his ex wife. It was a weird idea. It was a crazy idea. But that crazy little gun might be his last chance at having his family not hate him.
1522.title: It's Shannon and Earl...the new waitress

choices: Earl returns just as Leah is about to take Daisy home.
Shannon walks in... with Earl following behind.
Earl returns... with his girlfriend Shannon in tow.
1523.content:
Having actually fallen back to sleep in his headswapped state, Frank was woken by the sound of the door opening, and he instinctively went to jump out of his chair like he normally would, but instead he forgot he was a literal bitch from the neck down. He landed clumsily on all fours and fell over, only to scramble back to his feet. And then in walked his 17 year old daughter Leah, wearing her usual white halter top, denim skirt and a pair of zip-up ankle boots with stiletto heels.

"You asleep again... DAD?" Leah spat, shaking her head. "I asked you to WATCH Daisy, not doze off like usual." She said, having noticed the pile of empty beer bottles. Amazingly, she said nothing about her dad's head being attached to her labrador's body, despite Frank waiting for her to freak the fuck out.

"Erm... got nothing else to do around here." Frank responded, looking up into his daughter's irritated but pretty face.

"Maybe if you stopped being such a slob and went out to find a job, you'd have something to do." Leah scolded her father, but it wasn't anything he hadn't heard before. He watched with surprise and interest as Leah walked over to Daisy, who immediately stood up like any normal human would and started licking her face. "You miss me? Hmm? Good girl!" Leah talked to Daisy, as Frank remained on all fours just staring, open mouthed. Just then he felt the sudden urge to have a piss, and he started pacing around, his paws tapping on the hard floor.

Leah noticed, and it was as thought she instantly knew what she had to do. She walked over to the door and opened it, gesturing for her dad to go out and relieve himself. "Go on then!" She said, staring down at him.

Frank, who was by this time feeling both embarrassed and even a little angry, just waddled his canine body out the door and into the yard. He found the nearest bush and took his first piss as a dog. It was a unique experience, but it was also totally humiliating, but at least his daughter didn't actually watch him do it. After all... that would have been too freaky right?

When he'd has his pee in the yard, Frank walked back into the house and Leah was giving Daisy some water, in a glass no less that she could now hold of course. Frank's irritation with his brother and his new device was growing by the second.

"So huh, how's your mother?" Frank asked Leah, who just scowled at him a little.

"What do you care?" Leah responded.

Frank just sighed, dropping his head to casually sniff at something on the floor. Yep, his ex-wife had certainly done a good job teaching her to hate him. But at the same time a part of Frank couldn't blame her either. But it was too late to change now, and he knew he probably couldn't anyway. Frank knew his best shot at making some money would be with his brother's crazy new doohickey.
1523.title: It's Leah wanting to pick up her dog

choices: Earl's got a dog body for a get rich quick scheme
Shannon gave Earl the dog body for karmic payback
15232.content:
Leah looked down at her dad with indifference as she continued to pet Daisy as her dog finished lapping up the water out of the glass the dog was now holding with Frank's human hands. As soon as she finished Leah held Daisy by the collar of Frank's dirty old shirt Daisy now had, "Well dad I'll see you later. I'm gonna need you to watch Daisy in a few days if you still aren't doing anything."

"Don't go!" Frank said with a bit of panic in his voice. Not because he didn't want his daughter to leave, he knew their relationship was probably beyond repair. No, Frank needed to keep Daisy and his real body around so that Earl could swap them back. Frank trotted on his four paws to stand in front of the door, "Why leave so soon, tell me how school's going?"

"It's Summer dad, I'm out of school for another month. Now do you mind moving."

Frank tried to think of something to say to his daughter to get her to stay but was coming up empty, when thankfully out of nowhere there was a knock on the door. "Earl? Is that you?" Frank said hopefully.

"No it's Shannon, Earl is a bit...tied up at the moment. Mind if I come in?" Frank's heart sunk upon hearing the voice of Earl's girlfriend. "Door's open." Frank said moving out of the doorway so she could come in. Shannon stepped in, still in her waitress uniform from the diner she worked at, The Pinup Paradise. It was a 50's themed diner just off the strip but all the waitresses wore outfits that wouldn't be out of place as a 50's centerfold. It was actually kind of average compared to some of the stuff some people wore out in public. She was currently wearing a very short red and white dress that didn't look like it would be out of place as a picnic blanket. Frank actually was a bit taken by surprise when he looked up to see her and got a face full of upstart. Leah used her dad's momentary distraction to slip past them both with Daisy without saying another word to her dad. "Bye Shannon, hope my uncle Earl isn't being too much trouble."

"I know how to deal with him, you take care." Shannon shut the door and looked down at Frank. "So, Earl actually did leave you here with the body of your kid's dog. He told me he did it but I guess seeing it is a whole other thing."

Frank's eyes widened, "Wait, you can tell that this isn't normal? Leah totally didn't freak out or anything when she saw me and Daisy."

Shannon nodded, "Yeah, Earl showed it to me at the diner and I looked at some of the settings. I think because I've messed with it now I can see it's effects on others."

"Earl didn't use it on you did he?"

Shannon flushed red and got an annoyed look on her face, "He tried to test it on me with the cook, Ol' Lucky, but Earl's aim was bad and he swapped my head with a coffee pot. He swapped me back a minute later but I'm going to make sure I pay him back for it. You have no idea how bad it is to have hot coffee poured out of your nose."

Frank laughed at the mental image before Shannon continued, "Sorry that I didn't swap you and Daisy back before Leah left, I didn't realize she was here when I pulled up."

"So you have the swapping gun? Let's go, maybe we can catch them before they leave."

"No, I left it in my car, sorry. But next time Daisy is around, call me up...if you can with those paws, and I'll come over and swap you back."

"No offence, but why you and not Earl?"

"First off, do you completely trust him to swap you back and not prank you again?" Shannon asked and Frank thought about it for a second, "Good point."

"And second of all...Earl isn't exactly capable of using the Head Swapping Gun or anything else that requires opposable thumbs. And now that it looks like the place is clear I'll let him in, wait here." Shannon quickly left, Frank tried to look out the window but the window was just a little too high for Frank to look out of. A minute later the door opened up again and Shannon walked back in with Earl following behind her on a leash. Earl now had the body of a female dalmatian.

Frank gave a big hardy laugh, "Looks like I'm not the only bitch in the building."

"Ha ha," Earl said sarcastically as made his way to a back room, "I've had an exhausting few hours so I'm gonna crash on your bed for a little bit. Shannon will explain everything."

As soon as Earl was out of earshot Frank quickly asked, "So what the hell is my brother also have a dog body now?"

Shannon smiled as she explained.
15232.title: Shannon walks in... with Earl somewhere behind

choices: A week later they are still waiting on the reward posting
A week later Leah finally drops Daisy back off
152321.content:
Shannon cleaned up a space on Frank's couch and sat as Frank climbed up into his usual chair, he wanted to be comfortable for this story. "So, after Earl accidentally swapped my head with the coffee pot, I admit, I overreacted a bit. I had a bit of a shouting match with him and I was told to leave for the day, I'm lucky I wasn't fired. I went for a walk in the park to cool off, both figuratively and literally." Shannon went to wipe her nose and upon closer look Frank could tell that it looked like her nostrils seemed to be slightly burned. "But you know Earl, he wouldn't leave me alone until he had his say. He apologized over and over again and after about the 20th 'I'm sorry' I was ready to listen. He started going on and on about how this Head Swapping Gun would make us all rich. I was a bit skeptical and Earl seemed to want to prove his theory so he saw people walking their dogs in the park. He talks about people will pay good rewards for lost pets. His plan is to swap heads with a dog, run away, then after a reward is posted, swap back and safely deliver the dog."

"But he already swapped me with Daisy and Leah just treated me like she normally did for the most part. They would just keep the dog with Earl's body."

"That's what happened the first time we tried it, luckily we swapped Earl back before the family got away. That's when we started messing with the settings on the gun. And after a few failed attempts, we managed to swap it so that Earl with the dalmatian's body was considered the real dog and the dalmatian with Earl's body seemed to go on auto pilot and went on the way back to his place. That little gun has a lot of complex settings that will get really complicated so make sure to make mental notes when messing with it."

Frank was trying to piece things together, "So, I have a dog's body but I'm still considered good old Frank, but Earl right now is considered some family's actual dog thanks to messing with the settings? That's really convoluded."

Shannon shrugged, "Yeah, but it's working for us right now. You should have seen it, after Earl swapped with the dog he had to run away for blocks in order to get away from his 'owners'. That's why he's so tuckered out now. I can tell that they'll definitely pay big bucks for their dog and we'll split it 3 ways. If this all goes well we can probably do it a few more times and make a nice little nest egg. You and Earl will take turns doing it of course, I would but I have a real job so..."

Sounded like a lot of work to Frank, but he guessed that it was better than doing nothing. "All right, I'm in. So what do we do until the reward goes up? That could take a few days."

"Well, I was hoping to leave Earl with you so that you could take care of him, but that's when he told me about swapping you and Daisy. Sorry again for not getting back in time to swap you back. I guess I'll still leave you and Earl as human headed dogs here until you swap back. I can't let Earl stay at my apartment, they have a strict no animal rule. So if it sounds good I'll stop by to let you guys out to go to the bathroom outside before and after I go to work. I guess I'll also refill the dog food and water bowls for you two."

"We're not trying to fool anyone, you can give us real food Shannon." Frank said indignantly.

Shannon began to look annoyed, "I'm barely going to have time to stop by to let you out and fill the bowls, I'm not going to be able to cook anything for you. And I'm not getting you fast food or that shit. You may have a human head but you still have a dog body and that food will make you sick as a dog. Literally. So it's going to suck but for now you'll have to occasionally live off of dog food. I promise I'll bring some table scraps when I get off of work so it won't be all bad."

Frank cursed to himself and cursed his brother for putting him in this situation. "Thanks Shannon, Earl doesn't deserve you."

She shrugged, "Yeah, but I like him anyways. The heart wants what it wants for some reason."
152321.title: Earl has a plan for his current dog body

choices: Shannon was back from work and had swapped them with something to stop the fight
A detective looking for the missing dalmatian found and tasered them
1523211.content:
"I'm just saying that if you're supposed to be taking good care of your own daughter's dog, why do you have to get the cheapest, smelliest, cardboard tastingest shit food you can find. It's like you went to a dollar store and that wasn't cheap enough so you dug some expired dog food out of the garbage. You really couldn't have gotten the good stuff with gravy and real meat for your own kid's dog?"

"Gee, I'm sorry that my 'expert taste' in dog food was so ill informed or up to your standards. I'll try to keep that in mind for the next time you SWAP ME WITH MY FUCKING DAUGHTER'S DOG! YOU ASSHOLE!"

It'd have been a week and Earl and Frank were getting more an more irritated with each other thanks to a number of factors mostly originating from the fact they had head swapped onto dog bodies. The two had been cooped up in Frank's grungy house filled with enough trash to make even the worst hoarder retch. Frank and Earl hadn't cared about it before, but that was before they had spent a week at eye level with rotting food, cockroach colonies, and dirty laundry. The only 'relief' they got was when Shannon would stop by in the morning and let them out in the back yard but for a few minutes to take care of business, but it was a very small yard and they were starting to run out of places to comfortably shit and Shannon had made it clear she had no interest in cleaning up after them. Since the two didn't have any fingers between them they couldn't put on any dads or watch anything on a computer, and since Frank was too cheap for cable and the only entertainment the two angry brothers had was each other. And without the ability to drink or do drugs with each other at the moment they were really being reminded why they needed those things as a buffer. The latest argument was over the food situation.

Frank got in the face of his dalmatian bodied brother, "So the next time you decide on a master plan that ends up with you staying at my place as a freaky dog man, maybe you should wait until I have my own fucking body, that you helped take from me, so that we aren't both stuck like this waiting on your girlfriend to feed us fucking kibble!"

"Trust me I will, and you'll be begging me to go back to being a dog once me and Shannon start raking in the reward money. You'll be begging literally on all fours for us to let you back in on this scam and you know what? I don't know if I'm going to, you little bitch." Earl snapped at his brother. Frank was done with taking it from Earl, he reared back on his back paws and jumped at Frank and started biting and clawing. Earl tried to wrap his paws around Frank to perform a wrestling slam but it just made him lose his balance and go to the ground. The two brothers rolled over now broken bottles as they clawed, bit, and head butted each other. The fight was so intense they didn't even hear the front door open. But they sure felt it when they each heard a voice shout, "That's enough!" As they both felt saw a light before they lost consciousness. It wasn't until they woke up they realized who it was and what had happened.
1523211.title: Tensions Rise as the Dog Bodied brothers wait

choices: A reward for the dalmatian was posted, she's swapped them back
She's taking them to her place and leaving them like this for now
15232111.content:
By the time Frank and Earl started coming to, it looked like Shannon was still in mid rant. Not only that her voice sounded, they couldn't think of another word for it, gargantuan. "I leave you alone for a few hours because I have to work, all the two of you have to do is nothing. Just don't fucking try to kill each other and you two can't even do that. Now don't move." Frank and Earl were still very disoriented from being shot with the Head Swapping Gun again, they weren't sure what had happened yet but the proportions of everything seemed so far off they didn't even know where they were. All of the sudden it was like the sun was blocked out, there was blackness, and the brothers felt something very large completely encase them and lifted them into the air. All the brother's could hear were the rush of the wind past their ears and each other's screaming. Then after a moment, each brother felt like they were being pushed into a tunnel and then they both fell. The fell for what felt like 40 feet and they each landed on their backs and immediately flipped onto their legs.

Each brother now had a moment to take everything in. They each seemed to view the world from a dark brown hue and they each seemed to be in a glass tomb of some sort. Finally they saw each other and what they saw horrified them. Just a minute ago, both brothers had been human heads on dog bodies trying to kill each other, and now that anger had been replaced with fear and disgust as they realized what Shannon had done. She had walked in and seen them fighting and swapped them with the first thing she saw to get them to stop. The brother's now had been swapped with a pair of nasty cockroaches in Frank's apartment. And what's more Shannon had picked them both up and put them each into their own empty beer bottle prison. Each brother looked at the horror that was their brother with their own head and the disgusting body of a cockroach, then they began to look at themselves. Earl thought he was going to throw up as he looked at the brittle looked stick thing that was his new limbs. Frank felt a wave of disgust and a little bit of fascination as he actually seemingly opened up his back to weakly spread to nasty looking wings. Both brothers starting to scream out in horror but they were soon drowned out by Shannon's voice.

"It's no use screaming, I can barely hear you two. I can't believe that I can't just trust you two to do nothing. That's all you had to do, nothing! Look at the damn roaches, they're more well behaved than you guys! Sure enough the brothers looked through the curvature of the bottle and saw the disturbing yet oddly kind of cute scene of the dalmatian and black lab bodies rolling on the floor playing with each other as two disgustingly huge cockroach heads felt each other with their antenna.

Shannon looked at the brothers with annoyance and stormed off to fill the dog food and water bowls, possibly to cool herself off more than anything. When she finished she picked up both bottles and rattled them around to show she was still mad. "Now listen up you two because I don't want to repeat myself...
15232111.title: Shannon Swaps the Brothers with bugs they are

choices: Shannon let's the roach brothers free in her apartment
Shannon swaps the brothers with some objects so at least they aren't bugs
152321112.content:
"Because the fucking cockroaches are being better dogs than you two, I'm taking you with me while we wait for that stupid reward posting and for you daughter to ask you to dog sit again, whichever happens first. Shannon said not even trying to hide the annoyance in her voice. The brothers tried to plead for her to stop but she had decided. She took Frank and Earl in their beer bottle prisons and put them in her purse before she left to go to her own apartment. The brothers were entrapped in darkness so they didn't have to look at each other's hideous form, but that didn't make the trip any easier. As Shannon walked her purse felt like it was bouncing up and down. Occasionally the bottles would bump into each other and for the brothers it was like a depth charge was blowing up each time. By the time Shannon stopped Frank wouldn't have been surprised if he had permanent ear damage.

Shannon put the beer bottles on her counter looked at them with disgust, both brother's tried to plead with Shannon but either she couldn't hear them or she didn't care. "I'm tired of dealing with you morons for now. Maybe if I'm feeling nice we can talk in the morning." With that she went to her kitchen and made herself a nice grilled cheese sandwich for her supper and deciding she wasn't going to starve the boys even though it was very tempting. So she stuffed a small chunk of cheese that was bigger than the roach bodied brother's heads, turned off the lights, and went to the bedroom.

Frank and Earl tried to take the opportunity of being alone to yell at each other again for their situation but due to both the bottles and their size they couldn't hear each other so the arguing died out quickly. The two ate as much cheese as they could, which wasn't a lot, and tried to go to sleep. But it wasn't very easy trying to get comfortable with their new 6 legged bodies. Earl tried to make it easier by drinking the last few drops of beer that was in his bottle and he was pleased that he was already buzzed and passed out soon afterwards. Sadly for Frank his bottle was bone dry so he just he to put his head down on the chunk of cheese as a stinky pillow. Although he his sleep didn't last as long as he liked as at some point in the middle of the night he heard a tapping on his bottle prison. Frank opened his eyes and after a few minutes he adjusted to the dark and screamed when he saw a couple of real 100% cockroaches looking at the glass. Cockroaches were already freaky, but when one is your size and right up in your face, well, let's just say Frank was probably never going to get that image out of his head.

The next morning Shannon turned the light on and the real cockroaches scattered. Shannon walked up to the brothers and said, "I've thought about it and while it's tempting to leave you like this locked up, that might be a step to far. I'm not going to give you guys human bodies or really any bodies you can cause trouble with but I'm not going to leave you stuck in their all day, so here's what I'm going to do.
152321112.title: She's taking Frank and Earl back to her place

choices: The bug brothers chase after Shannon
Frank and Earl try to relax in the appartment
1523211121.content:
"I'm going to let you both out of your bottles. What you do from there, honestly I'm still so pissed at you both I don't care. But if you don't want to get squashed or eaten by a bird or something you should probably enjoy whatever comforts my apartment can give two little cockroaches. God knows I've got a bunch here already, letting two more loose can't lower the places value anymore." Shannon took both beer bottles and turned them upside down on the ground and gave them a little jiggle until Earl and Frank fell out much more dizzy than they were before.

"I'm off to work, goodbye." Shannon said still sounding a bit cold and mad at the brothers. But as Shannon was getting her stuff by the door Earl called out to his brother, "Let's go."

Frank couldn't believe what he was hearing, and in fact the gigantic room was still spinning for him. "What do you mean, 'let's go'? Let's go where?"

Earl quickly scampered on his 6 legs to Frank and said, "Shannon's not leaving us like this, we follow her and she has to change us back. Now quick, we can still sneak into her purse."

"Are you insane? Even if we catch up to her and somehow not get squashed in the bag she's still pissed at us. At the point she might squish us out of spite."

"Do you want to be a bug any longer than you have to? Come on, if we move now we still have a chance to catch her."

Frank knew why Earl was so desperate to get Shannon to swap him. Being a disgusting bug, so small and so vulnerable was really freaking scary. A damn beer bottle of all things had been an unbreakable prison just minutes ago. But chasing after Shannon now seemed like suicide. "Come on Earl, let's give her some time to cool off, this sucks but we can man up and deal with it until she gets back." Earl looked at his bug brother, and since his first instinct of punching him wasn't an option with his cockroach leg thing, he actually considered his words before making a decision. Frank continued, "Listen Earl, if you want to be crazy and chase Shannon I'll follow you, I don't want you to be out there, but man I really think it's a bad decision."
1523211121.title: Shannon let's the roach brothers Free

choices: It's good news, that family finally posted a reward for the dog
It's bad news, very bad news.
15232111212.content:
Earl took a deep breath, catching a nice whif of his cockroach body in the meantime, and said, "Fine, whatever. I'll just sit here and wait upon the kindness of others and just sit around like a lazy bum aka you."

"Do you want to go at it again? We can do that!" Frank said skittering up to Earl putting the brother's heads right next to each other. Earl just snorted and backed off, "We'll settle this later, for now just stay away from me. I'll go and stay in the bedroom and bathroom, you stay here the kitchen and living room. We don't go into each others territory and we stay happy. Deal."

"Deal." Frank said, as much as he wanted to just deck his brother for being a stubborn ass, now was not the time for that. Earl scampered off underneath the door to Shannon's bedroom. Earl being the stubborn son of a bitch he was decided that he just wanted to stew in his anger at his brother and girlfriend for this whole thing. It was just supposed to be a simple scam. Take a family's dog via Head Swapping Gun, hold it until a reward was posted, swap back and gain reward. Simple as that and now thanks to his brother and girlfriend he was stuck as a damn roach. Earl tried to make the best of his situation by crawling under the bed and seeing if he could find any porn or something to keep him busy, but it was too dark and he sadly concluded even if he found something he couldn't think of how he could enjoy himself with his cockroach body. Bitterly Earl found a pillow on the ground by Shannon's bed and fell asleep.

Frank also wanted a good night's sleep. He looked at the living room and found an old bra that was behind Shannon's couch and actually fell asleep himself. But it didn't last too long. A few hours later Frank woke up and had one thing on his mind. He'd had nothing to eat but old cheese and stale dog food for the last week and he wanted to find something, anything, that wasn't terrible to eat. Frank first just went along the floor of the kitchen and outside of a few crumbs didn't find anything. He looked up at the counter and wondered how to get up there. Then he remembered the features his new body had. Frank concentrated for a few seconds and succeeded in opening up his wings and started flapping them as fast as he could. And like a shot Frank flew. He flew straight head first into the wall. After waking up after a probable concussion Frank decided to try something else. He went up to the wall and lifted up one of his front, hairy looking, stick like legs and put it on the wall. Sure enough he pulled it back and had a real 'grip' on it.

"Here goes nothing," Frank said as slowly, only moving one out of six legs at a time, he began making his way to the countertop. It took about 10 intense minutes of feeling like a mountain climbers but Frank finally made it and was happy with what he saw. Sitting there like a giant glowing ruby was a delicious looking apple that was the size of a small house compared to his current size. Frank skittered up to it and using his still human teeth took as big a bite out of it that he could. He mostly got apple skin but he didn't care, this tasted like heaven compared to the garbage dog feed he'd primarily been eating for the last week. After a few minutes of feasting Frank noticed he wasn't alone anymore. A cockroach had emerged from who knows where and was pushing up next to Frank. "Hey, back off buddy!" Frank yelled at the roach, but it didn't react. It was just enjoying the white meaty gold inside the apple. Frank figured that it was only doing this because Frank had been able to break through the skin for it. Frank was going to shout more but figured that even if he somehow scared it off, he wasn't going to eat in the same place as the roach. But since the apple was more than big enough for the both of them, Frank went to the other side of the apple and dug in again.

After minutes of eating Frank felt like his stomach or whatever a roach had was feeling full. "How do these things shit? Do they even?" Frank ignorantly asked himself. Deciding to just give it a shot Frank lifted up his wings and tried to relieve himself. He didn't know if it worked, he definitely felt like something happened to his body but it wasn't a feeling he'd ever had before. "Whatever, that was it was fucking weird and nasty." Frank went turned his attention to the apple again only to see his roach companion was there again. "What the fuck, you've got your half of the apple leave my half alone." But instead of the apple the roach seemed to be paying attention to Frank. He started touching Frank with his antenna and started lifting it's wings as if to signal something. Frank even noticed a weird musk smell in the air that he hadn't noticed before.

Frank was curious about what this roaches deal was, but before his tiny brain could make any connections the door opened. Shannon walked in and called out. "Boys! Get in here, I've got news! Shannon entering the room had scared off the other roach, which was ok with Frank as he made he began to try to wave to Shannon to make himself more visible. Shannon noticed him and bent down to here him shout to her, "What's going on?" Shannon looked at Frank and told him some news.
15232111212.title: Frank and Earl try to relax in the appartment

choices: Temporarily stay a roach and help Shannon
Insist on going with Earl and Shannon to the swap
152321112121.content:
Shannon had a big smile on her face as she said, "I just saw a reward in the paper for the family's lost dalmatian. I'm going to grab Earl, the dog, and his body, put things right and we'll have our reward. Shannon was speaking with such enthusiasm Frank actually felt like he was about to fly away thanks to the energy from Shannon's voice. "That's fucking great, I'm ready for this to be over."

"You're telling me, where's the loser boyfriend of mine hiding? He didn't get himself squashed did he? Shannon asked sarcastically, but she actually looked a little worried.

Frank shouted up, "He's in your bedroom sleeping I think, be careful." Shannon nodded and grabbed one of the beer bottles as she made her way back to her room. Frank couldn't tell what Shannon as saying in there, but he could tell she was saying something to him. A few minutes later Shannon emerged with Earl inside the bottle ready for another trip.

"We're off to do the swaps and get the money, see you in a while Frank. Shannon said getting her stuff ready to leave again. This was not what Frank wanted to here, "HEY!" Frank shouted as loud as he could and waived his front legs to get Shannon's attention. Thankfully it worked. "Aren't you forgetting someone? I need to get back on Daisy's body and stop being a freaking roach!"

Shannon founded, "I know it must suck to be a bug, but listen to it from my end. Even if I swap you back you still have a dog body and can't take care of yourself so I'd me or Earl will still have to come over and take care of you. But if you stay here, I'll help you find a temporary body until you can get your real body back from your kid's dog. Please Frank. I'll even give you part of my split. Come on Frank, I really don't like having to go to your pig sty of a house before and after work every day so that I can give you dog food. Please.

Frank did not like the idea of staying a roach even for another few hours because Shannon felt like being lazy.

"Come on Frank," Shannon's booming voice pled, "You might even find the source of my roach infestation. If you find it I'll pay you good money."

Money did make this offer slightly less shitty to Frank, and with his cockroach buddy he already had a lead on that. Finally he made a decision.
152321112121.title: It's good news, time to get ready for the Reward

choices: Frank can't find a way out
1523211121211.content:
Frank looked up at Shannon and shouted, "Fine, I'll stay like this, but when you get back I want a new body! I don't want to be afraid of newspapers the rest of my life."

Shannon didn't even wait for Frank to finish as she turned to leave, Ok, thanks bye Frank. Almost immediately after Shannon left the apartment, Frank heard a skittering from the kitchen countertop behind him. Frank looked around and saw that his cockroach 'buddy' was back. The cockroach again approached Frank used it's antenna to poke around Frank's body. Frank didn't know if he had grown a pair, if he was just used to it already, or if that Head Swapping Gun had some sort of adjusting affect, but a cockroach being face to face with him wasn't freaking him out with the nightmare fuel that it would have been just yesterday. On top of that Frank had no plans to actually help Shannon out with her roach problem, but he figured since the cockroach seemed to be practically begging him to followed he figured why the hell not. The cockroach opened up it's wings again and almost like it was asking Frank to follow it,moved across the countertop crawled across the wall behind the refrigerator.

Frank followed behind getting more and more used to walking on the walls as he did so. Once the cockroach led Frank behind the fridge, Frank took a minute to let his eyes adjust to the darkness and once he did he saw that the cockroach was waiting for him by a small hole in the wall. Frank took a gulp and followed the roach. Again Frank had to wait for his eyes to adjust to the dark but when they did Frank didn't like what he saw. He didn't know how many but he could see what had to be hundreds of...things moving and crawling and undulating in the darkness. Frank wanted to throw up, but he wasn't sure his current body he the ability to do so.

Frank felt the now familiar feeling of the cockroach's corse antenna tapping on his head and body. Frank responded, "Well thanks for that buddy. Now that you showed me your evil layer I'm going to go away and get out of here so I can help Shannon exterminate each and every one of you creepy little fucks." Frank turned to locate the exit but it was still so dark he couldn't quite see it easily. "How the fuck do I get out of here." Frank felt a little antsy and lifted his wings in frustration and he let something into the air. As soon as he did this he thought he heard a jet plane take off as about a hundred or so roaches did the same thing. Frank even smelled an overwhelming scent that had taken over the small hole in the wall. It was the same scent that the cockroach buddy from before had set off only now it was 100x more intense. Suddenly it was like a dog pile had happened, Frank screamed as he felt antenna, legs, and bodies crawled all over him. He even felt a weird...perspiration of sorts.

All of the sudden a lightbulb went off in Frank's head about what was happening to him and his current cockroach body, Frank screamed at the top of his equivalent of lungs and shouted, "YOU FUCKERS! DID YOU JUST...! I'M GOING TO STOMP ON EVERY LAST ONE OF YOU!" Frank began using his bug legs to try and ineffectively punch and kick everything he could reach. He fought and fought for what felt like at least an hour. He was mad, but he was tired. And he knew had to get out of there before he was made into a cockroach queen.
1523211121211.title: Temporarily stay a roach and help Shannon

choices: It's the body of an old ceramic doll
Shannon gave Frank the body of a homeless woman outside her apartment
15232111212111.content:
Frank fought, oh man did he fight. He used everything he had, his wings, his 6 legs, and even using head butting and biting in order to escape the mountain of roaches he found himself amidst. He did so until he saw a faint light above him. Desperately he clung to the wall and climbed as though his life depended on it. He heard a pitter patter of little clawed legs behind him but he finally made it. He escaped from the hell that was behind Shannon's refrigerator and was back in the daylight where the cockroaches didn't want to follow. "Yeah that's right! What up fuckers! You aint gonna get me that easily!"

Almost as though on cue the door opened and Shannon walked in with an envelope in one hand and the Head Swapping Gun in the other. Shannon saw Frank waiting on the countertop and said, "Good news! We got the cash! And what's more I swapped Earl with another dog so we could start the scam all over again with a different family. It took Earl forever to get away this time, I swapped him with a little weiner dog, which is ironic since I think he's a bitch again. What are the odds? So how was the roach hunt?"

Frank shouted, "They're behind the fridge, all of them, now give me a body so that I can kill every last one of those fuckers!"

"Geeze, somebody is pissy today. What'd the stupid bugs do to you?" Shannon said but Frank didn't feel like answering that question. Shannon pointed the Head Swapping Gun at Frank and said, "I thought about it on the way back and I think I thought of a good body for you to use for a while." Shannon shot at Frank and he saw a blue light before he passed out.

He didn't know how long he was out but he was very happened when he looked down and saw that he no longer had a bug body, but in fact seemed to have some hands. As he was still coming to, Frank heard Shannon's voice "I hope you enjoy the body I picked out for you myself."

"What kind of body do I have?" Frank said as he began to look at himself.
15232111212111.title: Frank manages to barely escape

choices: Shannon decides to just keep Frank as a pet
Shannon records Frank with his doll body to make money on the internet
152321112121111.content:
As Frank looked down it looked almost like his new arms were glued to his new body. With a lot of tugging Frank managed to pry them up and saw that the arms were not quite human. His arms were thick oddly chunky. Frank looked down and saw he seemed to have a pair of misshapen breasts. Frank in a bit of disbelief put his hands to his breasts and heard a thunk as his hands seemed to bang against a chest that was as hard as a rock. And it wasn't only his new hands and chest. Frank took a good look at his entire body and realized his entire body seemed to be made of stone. Including the really old looking red dress he was wearing. It looked so old that the paint was chipping off. "Paint? Stone? What the hell is going on?" Frank said.

Shannon's voice boomed above him, "I figured you wanted a more human body so I swapped you with an old ceramic doll I got from my grandmother. I always thought it was ugly so I don't mind you keeping it."

Frank looked up and once again saw that his brother's girlfriend was still towering over him, although not nearly as much. Frank looked at his surroundings and saw that he'd gone from being a few millimeters tall as a cockroach, to now being about 3 inches tall. As a matter of fact, Frank looked to his left and saw the odd sight of an ugly stone head attached to a roaches body that had been his moments earlier. Frank was taking in the odd sight when out of nowhere Shannon's fist came crashing down, crushing the doll headed roach. It was like an earthquake went off for Frank, an Earthquake that sent roach goo flying at him. When he stopped being disoriented Frank shouted out, "What the hell Shannon!"

Shannon wiped her hand on the counter, "What? I always hated that doll anyways. Why? You upset I crushed your old roach body? I'm sure I can find a new one for you behind the fridge if you miss it so much.

"No no, I'm good. So, now that I have a humanish body, what's next on the agenda?"

Shannon spun the Head Swapping Gun around her fingers and said, "I've been thinking about that, and with that body of yours I know just what I want to do with you."
152321112121111.title: It's the body of an old ceramic doll

choices: Frank likes the plan and agrees.
Frank is tired to following Shannon and tries to take the Head Swapping Gun.
152321112121112.content:
As Frank continued to recover from being shot with the Head Swapping Gun he noticed that not only did he have human hands, he had a woman's hands. Although they were so dirty, scratched, and calloused it wasn't obvious at first glance. Before Frank's vision could even come back completely something else became painfully obvious.

"What the hell? Where did you find this body, the sewer? I somehow smell worse than the cockroach colony behind your fridge." Frank said gagging a bit as he spoke.

"Well I figured that you wanted to be human and the most convent body available was this homeless lady who lives across the street in the ally. Why? Would you rather be the cockroach, I doubt I could find her at this point so it'd have to be a random one you aren't as familiar with." Shannon said sarcastically.

"Wait, so the lady whose body I've got now is stuck as a cockroach?"

Shannon shrugged, "Well duh, but don't worry too much, I made it so she always thinks she was a cockroach. And let's face it, looking your current body it might be a step up in quality of life."

Frank now had a chance to take a better look at his body. It seemed to be that of a woman in her 30's. Frank could actually see the his new bones through his unhealthy almost see through skin. Lifting up the sleeves on a jacket that was falling apart Frank could definitely see injections from some hardcore stuff that Frank had only been stupid enough to try once and only once in his life.

Shannon opened the door to her room, "If you want to look at yourself do it in the shower. And make sure you stay in their until you don't smell like shit. We'll talk about what to do next when you get out."

Frank did as he was told and started up a warm shower. Frank stripped off the rest of the homeless body's poor excuse of clothing that looked more like a pile of trash when he put them on the ground. Sure enough this woman's body was not in great shape, it was all skin and bone except for the two C cup balloons on his chest that were hanging uncomfortably low. "This chick desperately needs a bra, hope Shannon doesn't mind me borrowing one." Frank said to himself before checking the shower water. It was just the perfect temperature when he stepped in. After spending a little over a week as both a dog and a cockroach, Frank felt a huge wave of pleasure when he felt the water palpitating against his new skin. As himself he had usually gone about as long between showers but this one felt beyond good. When Frank got out he raided Shannon's closet and put on a bra that fit enough to provide some support and pair of panties before waltzing back into the living room.

Shannon look at Frank and raised her eyebrows, "If you were going to put on my clothes you could have at least put on a shirt and a skirt."

Frank shrugged his new shoulders, "I didn't feel like it," the lazy man said casually.

"Whatever, I'm glad you're done and cleaned up okay, because I wanted to let you in on the next plan and that little body of yours." Shannon said while waving the Head Swapping Gun in front of her face. "You see, while Earl is going to be taking money from rich people who like their doggies too much, you're going to help me scam the government."

"Say what? That already sounds like too much work that can go too wrong."

"Just shut up and listen, I convert my apartment into a 'wayward home for homeless women'. I take a woman in off the street aka you, we rehab you by making you look pretty and making sure you don't shoot up, then some time later a government stooge comes by to give the okay. We get a government funded paycheck, then I swap you with another woman from the homeless shelter, and we've got ourselves a business and we won't have to do any real work."

"Are you sure that's how government programs work?" Frank asked skeptically.

"I'm pretty sure. I saw it on tv once. Now let's do this."
152321112121112.title: Shannon gave Frank the body of a Homeless Woman

15232111212112.content:
Frank tried to claw, kick, and bite his way out from the seemingly endless pile of cockroaches. Every time Frank got a small opening to look for an escape about ten more cockroaches piles on. He screamed for help, but no help came.

Survive. It was all Frank could do. It wasn't much of an existence for Frank. It only took a day or so before Frank lost most of his sense of self. After all, losing his mind was better than the alternative of being aware of the hell he was trapped in. Frank seemed to be the pride of the cockroach colony, he was protected at all times and would constantly have gifts of crumbs, fruit pieces, and old cheese spat up before him which Frank would desperately gobble up. Eating was all Frank did until eventually when he began to lay about thirty eggs which would get the same protection as him. After he would lay them the mountain of cockroaches surrounded Frank again until he had once again been successfully impregnated and the cycle began anew.

It was the life of a cockroach, it should have been insignificant. But Frank wasn't normal cockroach 'mother'. When the eggs began to hatch they were not normal cockroaches, but they had horrifying human heads. Within a few months hundreds of human headed cockroaches were crawling around Shannon's apartment. And then when those roaches matured they had human headed roach children of their own. Within a year thousands upon thousands of cockroaches had infested the entire building. Then the dark times began.

The roaches had begun to develop human levels of intelligence and a sense of anger and vengeance derived straight from the hybrids matriarch. One night the cockroaches a combined strike killed Shannon and every other person in the apartment building. Their numbers would grow and they would move from building to building. Any human who discovered them were destroyed.

A year later the notations of the world began to fall. Humans in power tried to fight back but the human/cockroach hybrids were all but impossible to kill. The cockroaches eventually got access of chemical weapons and the war was all but over. The cockroaches had won. They cemented their victory by launching all the nuclear weapons at once and destroying everything on the planet except for themselves.

Frank would be remembered as a god. The mother of the future. The mother of the end of the world.
15232111212112.title: Because Frank can't get out the World Ends

choices: Shannon and Earl get the reward.
The family has stopped looking for their dog. Where's Earls body?
Follow Frank and his daughter Leah.
1523211121212.content:
"No, Shannon!" He said to her. "At the very least, you have to give me some other body. I won't stay this way!"

"Well, you don't have a choice, you insignificant little bug. How will you learn a lesson if I change you back?" Shannon asked, angry.

"How about this: you can still punish me and give me whatever body you want....but I don't want to constantly be fearing for my life at this size!" Frank yelled.

He did have a point. He could be squashed at any moment and Shannon really did not want that.

"Alright, Frank, get in here." She opened her purse and pulled out the bottle with Frank in it. She opened the top of it and gestured for Frank to fly inside. Still having trouble, he told her to lay out her hand which she hesitantly did. He scurried onto her hand and quick scattered on into the bottle with Earl.

The two were still angry with each other from earlier. But, they were all each other had at this point at their size, so they talked with one another. "I can't wait til I'm back to normal...." Said Earl.

"You're telling me...at least you haven't been swapped as long as me. I'm almost forgetting what my body looks like." Frank said, worrying about the future.

"Well, your body is in good hands with your daughter. That dog on my body is on autopilot. What if it disappears altogether?" Both were pretty worried, to be honest.

After being knocked and tumbled around in the purse for what seemed like forever, the light of day once again poured into the purse followed by the giantess hand of Shannon. She pulled the jar out and set it on the table momentarily. She went and found the dog-bodied roaches playing with each other in the backyard and brough them inside. Earl, having already mastered flight without his brothers knowledge, flew out of the top of the bottle the instant Shannon opened it. Instead, Frank maneuvered his way out by climbing up the side of the bottle and out the top.

Earl stood on the table as Shannon shot him and the Dalmatian-bodied roach with the gun, supplanting them on the other's body. The roach, unaware of anything, scurried off the table, across the floor and out of sight. "Damn, I never thought I'd be happy to say I have this body back!" Earl laughed.

"Forgetting something?!" Yelled Frank up at the two.

"Ah, yes. I have come up with an idea to give you back a better body and still punish you. She aimed the remote at the Daisy-bodied roach and Frank and fired away. Frank now had Daisy's body again underneath his head.

"How is this improving anything??" Frank asked with a frustrated voice.

"Well, it is a bigger body and your head is back to normal size, but I did make one drastic change." Said Shannon. "Like Earl here, who is considered the dog and not the human, you are now considered in this reality to be Daisy. I did this for two main reason: 1) Since I cannot take care of you, someone else needs to let you out and feed you. 2) This is a once in a lifetime opportunity Frank! You can get to know and understand your daughter better. Once you understand her better, I will swap you and Daisy back to normal."

"Earl, help me out here! You get your body back, why shouldn't I get mine?" Frank pleaded.

"How about this, if you haven't gotten to understand her a bit better in one week, we will swap you back regardless?" Earl proposed.

Frank thought about it. A max of one week, plus, he could potentially get a look into his daughter's life and learn how to connect with her from then on and be the father he never was.

"Alright......ill do it! But one week, MAX!" Frank said. Shannon and Earl nodded towards each other. The three didn't always get along, but when it came to Frank's daughter, they know he felt awful for the years he neglected her and all he wanted was an opportunity to right his wrongs with her of all people.

"So, wait...what about Leah?" Frank asked them.

**KNOCK** **KNOCK**

"Speak of the devil...." Shannon trailed off.

info.brief_description: A collection of stories involving people's heads being swapped.
info.description:
A short introduction, since the stories will be fleshed out inside. Basically this will be a series of stories where the theme is head switching. The characters will have their heads swapped onto other people's bodies by a variety of means. It can be any method, magic spell, a unique ability, alien/secret government technology etc. This is for people to have fun adding to, I hope. Lets keep the genre alive.

Please feel free to add chapters.

Character Lists: (Different arcs)

Choice 1: Twin siblings Jacob and Evie Johnson, 15 years old, Caucasians, come into possession of a device that can switch people's heads, and only they are aware of the changes. Their parents are Graham Johnson, 45, and Barbara Johnson, 41, and they have an older brother James, 19, and a younger sister Emma, age 12.

Choice 2: Single mother Janet Morelle, 39, a blonde Caucasian, finds a device or develops an ability to swap people's heads around, her own included. Janet has a 17 year old son called Sean and a 14 year old daughter called Faith. Her ex-husband Richard, 37, lives a couple of miles away with his new girlfriend Lucy, 31.

Choice 3: An unhappy white family man, William Blaine (or Bill), age 40, is drowning his troubles in alcohol at his local bar when he meets a mysterious stranger who give him a device/ability that will change his life, in ways he never imagined. Bill has a nagging 42-year old wife named Cheryl, and two unappreciative kids, Kevin, 19, a high-school dropout, and Tina, 17, who hangs around in a teen gang with her friends.

Choice 4: A black high school student, Latisha Lewis, 16, is the one who discovers a remote or gains an ability to swap heads, and proceeds to use it to have fun with those around her. Latisha lives with her mother Michelle, 44, and also has an older sister Monique, 20, an older brother Marlon, 18 and a younger sister Kaycee, age 13. Latisha's father, Martin, died when she was 10 years old.

Choice 5: 13-year old Isaac Simmons, a nerdy schoolboy, is the one who can swap people's heads (by whatever means). Ben lives at home with his 37-year old mother Jennifer, his dad Henry, 40, his older brother Andy, 18, his older sister Sarah, 16, and his 10-year old sister Chloe.

Choice 6: Nevada-born brothers Earl and Frank Carlson, aged 32 and 37 respectively, are our head switching protagonists. Poster boys for losers everywhere, these two unemployed, hard-drinking, drug-taking siblings are about to have their lives changed forever by a certain device/power etc. Frank is divorced from his ex-wife Linda, 36, and has a daughter, Leah, 17, who hates him just as much as her mother does. Earl has a on/off girlfriend called Shannon, 28, who works as a waitress in a small diner.

Choice 7: 15-year old Madison Lui, an Asian-American girl becomes our spunky protagonist. Madison is an outgoing kind of girl, and lives with her mother Sandra, 39, her white step-dad Jason, 35, her older brother Daniel, 17 and her younger sister Emily, 13. Her real dad, Steven Lui, 41, now lives with his new British girlfriend Charlotte Edwards, 36, several blocks from the family's home.

Quite friendly, Ethan is liked by most people in the neighborhood, but quite a few people also dont like him.

More choices will be available...

No senseless killing off of the characters.

Apart from that... anything goes, have fun.
